items.title: Auto parts maker Suprajit Engineering sees 'minimal impact' of 25 percent Trump tariffs, exploring 'full relief' from buyers

items.title: Concerns of retail response in mega IPOs? Here are 10 IPOs that saw retail put in bids worth more than Rs 10,000 cr each
